clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Pomegranate Juice in the Modulation of Oxidative Stress Markers in Endurance-based Athletes

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate modifications of plasma protein carbonyls and malondialdehyde levels in endurance-based athletes after three weeks of pomegranate juice consumption.

primary_outcome.measure: Protein carbonyls levels changes in plasma
primary_outcome.description: Protein carbonyl derivatives were determined using an adaptation of the colorimetric method published in Levine et al. (1994) based in the formation of a stable 2,4-dinitrophenyl (DNP) hydrazone product after the addition of 2,4-dinitrophenylhydrazine (DNPH) to tha plasma. Protein carbonyls were calculated as nmoles·mg-1 protein

Malondialdehyde was determined by high pressure liquid chromatography (HPLC) with fluorescence detection according to the method described by Laporta et al. (2007). Malondialdehyde levels were calculated as nmoles·g-1 protein

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood biochemical parameters changes in plasma
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemical parameters is a composite outcome measure consisting in circulating plasma glucose (mg·dL-1), HDL-cholesterol (mg·dL-1), triglycerides (mg·dL-1), ferritin (ng·mL-1), lactate (mg·dL-1), sodium (mEq·L-1), potassium (mEq·L-1), creatine kinase (U·L-1), aspartate aminotransferase (U·L-1) and alanine aminotransferase (U·L-1) were analyzed through biochemistry methods.

secondary_outcome.measure: C-reactive protein levels changes in plasma
secondary_outcome.description: Determination by immunoassay of C-reactive protein (ng·mL-1) levels in plasma.

secondary_outcome.measure: Soluble E-selectin levels changes in plasma
secondary_outcome.description: Determination by immunoassay of soluble E-selectin (ng·mL-1) levels in plasma.

arm_group.description: Arm that followed all the protocols with the exception of the pomegranate juice intake.
Arm that followed all the protocols and the pomegranate juice intake.
Arm that followed all the protocols and the pomegranate juice dilution (1:1) intake.

intervention.description: Intake of 200 ml of pomegranate juice or pomegranate juice dilution during 21 days after exercise.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Perform specific endurance training sessions
- More than 1 hour per session and more than 3 sessions per week
- Have participated recently in a half marathon or similar event
Exclusion Criteria:
- Intake of antioxidant or anti-inflammatory supplementation
- Present a chronic disorder
- Non-smoker
- No-alcoholic beverage consumption
